A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A absolute travesty to Star Wars canon\, the characters involved\, the legacy\, the technology.  It is heartbreaking and depressing to feel this way about Star Wars.  Rian Johnson intentionally ruined everything the books\, the original movies\, and even JJ Abrahm's Episode VII set up for the future.  A rape of everything that is sacred about Star Wars.
